item.title: [Rental] Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Endless creativity. The Behringer DeepMind 12 synthesizer offers a vast array of sounds and intuitive controls, inspiring musicians to explore new sonic territories with ease.
item.content:encoded:
Dive into a world of boundless sonic possibilities with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting your musical journey, this powerhouse of a synthesizer is designed to inspire and elevate your sound to new heights.
Featuring 12 voices of pure analog power, the DeepMind 12 offers rich, warm tones that will breathe life into your music. With its extensive modulation options, dual FX engines, and comprehensive control panel, you have the tools to sculpt your sound exactly the way you envision it.
Explore a universe of sound with over 1,000 factory presets, or unleash your creativity and craft your own unique patches from scratch. The intuitive interface makes sound design a breeze, allowing you to focus on your creativity without getting bogged down in technicalities.
Whether you’re performing live or producing in the studio, the DeepMind 12 is built to deliver. Its robust build quality and reliable performance ensure that it will stand up to the demands of any musical environment.
Experience the power of analog synthesis with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Let your imagination run wild and discover a world of sonic possibilities like never before.

  • 49 Half-weighted full-size keys
  • Velocity sensitive keys with aftertouch
  • 4 FX engines powered by tc electronic and Klark Teknik
  • 24 oscillators – 2 OSCs and LFOs per voice
  • 3 ADSR generators
  • Switchable 2- or 4-pole low-pass filter per voice
  • High-pass filter
  • 8-Channel modulation matrix
  • 32-Step control sequencer
  • Envelope Depth
  • Key tracking
  • Remote controllable via iPad/PC/Mac, USB, MIDI or built-in Wi-Fi
  • 26 Knobs and one switch per function for direct access to all important parameters in real time
  • 1024 Programme memories
  • Built-in and adjustable Wi-Fi client
  • LC display
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 822 x 257 x 103 mm
  • Weight: 8.4 kg
  • Designed and engineered in the U.K.
  • Suitable optional bag: Art.479789 (not included in delivery)
  • suitable optional case: Art.416352 (not included in delivery)

item.title: [Rental] Yamaha Stage Custom Birch Drum Set
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: High-quality drum set with birch shells for superior tone and projection.
item.content:encoded:
The Yamaha Stage Custom Birch drum set is a versatile and reliable instrument suitable for players of all levels. Featuring 100% birch shells, this drum set delivers a rich, focused sound with enhanced projection and sustain. With its durable hardware, professional finish options, and customizable configuration, the Stage Custom Birch is ideal for stage performance, studio recording, and practice sessions.

  • Stage Custom Series
  • High gloss lacquered 6-ply birch wood shells
  • Colour: Raven Black
  • Chrome hardware
  • Y.E.S.S. tom mount system
  • Absolute lugs
  • Steel hoops
  • Redesigned bass drum feet

Shell set comprises:

  • 22″ x 17″ Bass drum with TH945B double tom holder
  • 10″ x 07″ Tom tom
  • 12″ x 08″ Tom tom
  • 16″ x 15″ Floor tom
  • 14″ x 5.5″ Snare drum

item.title: [Rental] Fender Telecaster Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Iconic solid-body electric guitar known for its timeless design and versatile tone.
item.content:encoded:
The Fender Telecaster is a legendary instrument celebrated for its simplicity, durability, and unmistakable sound. With its solid ash or alder body, bolt-on maple neck, and single-coil pickups, the Telecaster delivers a distinctive twangy tone that’s been heard on countless recordings across various genres. Whether you’re playing country, rock, blues, or beyond, the Telecaster offers timeless style and unmatched playability.

  • Body: Alder
  • Maple neck
  • Fretboard: Maple
  • Matte neck finish
  • 22 Frets
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Scale: 648 mm
  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo V single coils
  • Volume knob and tone knob
  • 3-Way toggle switch
  • Standard sealed machine heads
  • Ex-factory stringing: Fender .009 – .042
  • Colour: Tidepool
